text: Yalakweyo ni ligongo lyanti wanganyao (achinakunaku) watite pakwasalila awala (achimakafili) wawaichimile ayila yawatulwisye Allah: “Chitunkunde ine mu ichindu (yenu, mpela yakum’benga Muhammadi ﷺ, ni kwagwisya ulesi wakusaka kuja kumenyana namwe ngondo).” Sano Allah ni akumanyilila asili syao
